## ErrorXConfig.cleanStack property

Control stack trace cleaning behavior - true: Enable automatic stack trace cleaning (default) - false: Disable stack trace cleaning entirely - string\[\]: Custom patterns to match and remove from stack traces

**Signature:**

```typescript
cleanStack?: boolean | string[];
```
